com.js.huffman.model.structures.node.tree

Class HuffmanTree

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.js.huffman.model.structures.node.tree.HuffmanTree

  • public class HuffmanTree
extends Object
    A binary-tree-like data structure. The core of Huffman coding. Symbols to be encoding are stored in leaf nodes. Branch nodes contain frequencies of their leaf symbols and a binary digit. The route from leaf to root displays the encoding of the symbol.
    Author:
    jack

      • descend

        public boolean descend(NodeKey key)
        Move the head of the tree down left or right based on the NodeKey.
        Parameters:
        key -
        Returns:
        true if after moving the head points a leaf node. Else false.
